ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Geforce 4 MX vs Geforce 4 Ti
ygData.msgSnippet: I saw the Ti for sale in Babbages but still like my MX enough that I ll wait before the Ti goes down in price. I also heard horror stories about people who
ygData.messageBody:
I saw the Ti for sale in Babbages but still like my MX enough that I'll wait
before the Ti goes down in price. I also heard horror stories about people
who ordered the Ti from Best Buy bc Best Buy was offering a really low price
(they basically mixed the price up with another card but didn't correct the
error until it was too late). They refused to ship the item after already
billing the customers. Customers had to file paperwork or call their credit
card companies to get their money back. In one particularly nasty case Best
Buy had a guy arrested when he tried to pick up his card that he had
purchased online from a store. They claimed he was trying to defraud the
store and called the police. Pretty crappy eh?
Ok, that's my rant for the day.
luv,
-Su

>I have played with both cards and I thought the Geforce 4 Ti made things
look better than the >MX. The 4 MX seems to basically be a 2 MX, just faster
and more memory. I may take back my >MX and get the Ti, the day that I spent
with that card was the most enjoyable day I ever spent in >EQ.
